notes: IDs are never reused; exactly one canonical name per TxType.
All state-changing protocol interactions are TxTypes.
SYSTEM-origin TxTypes are BLOCK-ONLY and deterministically triggered; they MAY be state-changing.
GovExecutor-gated TxTypes are BLOCK-ONLY; emitted by deterministic executor logic after passing governance.
Receipt-only TxTypes MUST specify valid parent TxTypes.
Block-context TxTypes are INVALID in the mempool.
Implicit behavior is forbidden; all authority derives from Tx-defined state transitions.
Spec constraint (v2.1): posting requires reputation >= 0.75 (encoded as min_reputation on post/comment create).
HARDENING: removed gate "Any" (unsafe as a reusable pattern); missing gate is only valid for SYSTEM+block-only in runtime enforcement.
HARDENING: removed gate "Guardian"; account recovery approvals must be enforced by recovery-config rules, not a global privileged role.
HARDENING: removed gate "GroupAdmin"; group authority must be scoped (e.g., Signer) rather than a standing admin gate.
HARDENING: unified "GroupEmissary" -> "Emissary" (treasury access is scope-based; role name should not encode treasury type).
SOCIAL: creator identifying tags are embedded in CONTENT_POST_CREATE and may be updated via CONTENT_POST_EDIT (no separate tagging TxTypes).
canon.source: WeAll Transaction Canon v1.22 — Full Enforceable Production Canon
